tldr: Electron is an open source framework for writing cross-platform desktop applications using JavaScript, HTML and CSS. From versions 30.0.0-alpha.1 to before 30.0.5 and 31.0.0-alpha.1 to before 31.0.0-beta.1, Electron is vulnerable to an ASAR Integrity bypass.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range and the application must be launched from a writable filesystem on Windows when the `embeddedAsarIntegrityValidation` and `onlyLoadAppFromAsar` fuses are enabled.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `Electron` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: ASAR Integrity Bypass By Just Modifying The Content
